# Pycryptodome Obfuscate - with Python
![img](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ferlyafriliyan/Pycryptodome/main/Data/Dystopia.jpg)

## <p align="left">üìö„ÉªExample„Éªüìö</p>

### Normal : Data/hello.py
```python3
import os, sys

#--> Clear Terminal
def clear():
    if "linux" in sys.platform.lower():os.system('clear')
    elif "win" in sys.platform.lower():os.system('cls')

def hello():
    myname = ", I am Ferly Afriliyan ! "
    project = "and I just finished creating a python project to Obfuscate Python3 files which is quite difficult to Reverse"
    print("Hello world", myname)
    print(project)
    
if __name__ == '__main__':
    clear();hello()
    
```

### Obfuscated : Data/cryptodome.py
```python3
# Take the encryption method from the website = https://pyobfuscate.com/pyd
created_by = "Ferly Afriliyan and Merch"
# Time : Wednesday, October 25, 2023 22:21:45
# Platform : Windows-AMD64

#pip install pycryptodome  , It works only v3.11 Above.
import random ,base64,codecs,zlib;pyobfuscate=""

obfuscate = dict(map(lambda map,dict:(map,dict),['(https://pyobfuscate.com)*(encrypt)'],['''Q>sEd83PFXkXAP#0;g=fj{0sAZP}UrQXADJdnJ9b(esy!?v91u0sC1pX9abug^{8wyA}7y-Bn#erI*71vuObx7*Rj`Pj%A8KBMR{tRg=B4+jW^{PhITR~EN=eBP%KB*t1UPMM^eI+PE!E#SyR)}9SU-ab6L5Ad$q!OBMy%=iobTqXkghNlft!)^q*cM3gfZCZ9&qaFp$q}@Mu)G>p#V?Z$5QpCGHUT8TH5zNsFiRzgx$VhR}g*8yy^~85McS`5fMOrRuJmbr0{dmSsC<CYs1MdIuHv~4MXv7{74IWMw@CS(XsuC<tC7Cr;Mf2A7Ag(H8I|n*~E#mW=h3&@!HVW0FBsuLsLc~+dnKbfp6vCEL5=Ye2@&oKU=ZHhN*J|Zk>_>fLCSNf4LyM_|wk67v#G*J2qbDaNPy34Mt?K(O=vpw8iMzK`Dpm?}B?3wHN+b&OFtJ2TA1Co{AQZPq#2PaEw5tl{AfG*=CT+Hp3bCmPsm&`B$^GeCm^yrxZq*&ZLpH)r&f%U~!}LyaaKB36OKNbfgI5_<4%Yk8Aui~jo{9M{6{h#8+Zn4rR~D)ty&?rd*8}+'''.replace('\n','')]))

```

## - Run a Termux :
```python
$ termux-setup-storage
$ termux-change-repo
$ pkg update && pkg upgrade -y
$ pkg install git
$ pkg install python -y
$ pkg install python-pip
$ git clone https://github.com/ferlyafriliyan/pycryptodome
$ cd pycryptodome
$ python Run.py
```


<br>

## <p align="left">üì¢„ÉªInformations„Éªüì¢</p>
- `‚úÖ` Code obfuscation with pycryptodome and base64, zlib, codec methods.
- `‚úÖ` Code is quite difficult to reverse to the original if you disable Obfuscate from Variables
- `‚èπ` The Obfuscation duration of the input file is quite long
<br>
